column1: Computer and Machine Vision option - Computational and Software Techniques in Engineering (MSc)
column5: This specialist option of the MSc Computational and Software Techniques in Engineering has been developed to deliver qualified engineers to the highest standard into the emerging field of digital signal and image processing who are capable of contributing significantly to this increased demand for both real-time and off-line systems operating over a range of mobile, embedded and workstation platforms.
column7: MSc Computational and Software Techniques in Engineering
column9: One year full-time, two-three years part-time
